name: Up a Creek
description:
You are on a dangerous river and YOU CAN'T TURN YOUR BOAT!!!

Press WASD to make a rower paddle,
and press Q or E to make the rowers change seats.

Try not to die... or get stuck! 

(and good luck!!!)

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "out of control".

Made by:

  • Gergely Tomcsányi, development
  • Wang Hai Feng, development
  • Kyle Glackin, art (kyle.glackin@gmail.com)
  • Jerzy Wujczyk, sounds and music (jerzy.wujczyk@gmail.com)
